name: posterizarr
tagline: A tool for generating custom posters for media libraries
description: Posterizarr is a self-hosted automation tool that integrates with Radarr/Sonarr to generate custom movie and TV show posters. It simplifies managing artwork for Plex and Jellyfin libraries.

features.title: Automated Poster Generation
features.description: Automatically create custom posters for movies and TV shows in your library

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Connect with Radarr to sync movie metadata and generate posters automatically

features.title: Media Server Sync
features.description: Automatically update posters in Plex, Jellyfin, and Emby libraries

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Preview generated posters before applying them to your media library
